Package game.controllers

Class RuneManager

java.lang.Object
game.controllers.RuneManager
public class RuneManager
extends java.lang.Object
A class that keeps track of RuneSources in the game and manages transfer of runes

  • Method Summary

      public void addRuneOwner​(Actor owner, int runeAmount)
      Adds a RuneOwner to the hashmap
      Parameters:
      owner - the actor who owns and holds the runes
      runeAmount - the amount of runes the actor initially holds

      Parameters:

      Checks if an actor is a rune owner

      Checks if an actor is a rune source

      Returns:
      boolean indicating if the actor is a rune source

    • addRunes

      public void addRunes​(Actor runeOwner, int amountAdded)
      Adds runes to a rune owner. checks if the actor exists as a rune owner then adds as required
      Parameters:
      runeOwner - actor we want to add runes to
      amountAdded - amount of runes to add

    • subtractRunes

      public void subtractRunes​(Actor runeOwner, int amountSubtracted)
      Subtracts runes from a rune owner. checks if the actor exists as a rune owner then subtracts as required
      Parameters:
      runeOwner - actor we want to subtract runes from
      amountSubtracted - amount of runes to subtract

    • transfer

      public java.lang.String transfer​(Actor attacker, Actor target)
      Transfer runes between two actors.
      Parameters:
      attacker - the actor who will receive runes
      target - the actor who will lose runes
      Returns:
      string indicating the result
